Third party software used by MakeStudio or Plugins
==================================================

1. JVCL/ JCL
Currently used for all Delphi Plugins
http://www.delphi-jedi.org/
Download at GitHub:
https://github.com/project-jedi

2. Delphi ZIP:
Used in ZIP Plugin
http://www.delphizip.org
Current Version is Delphi Zip v1.9.1

3. Microsoft HTML Help Workshop
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=21138

or do a Web search...

4. Inno Setup
http://www.jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php

5. Pascal Script
http://www.remobjects.com/ps.aspx
or
https://github.com/remobjects/pascalscript
